global.fees_warning: Remember, any transaction that moves assets within, to, or from the Ethereum blockchain will incur gas fees. Only transactions conducted exclusively on Polygon are gas-less.

account_card_header.tooltip_ethereum: Your MANA balance on the main Ethereum blockchain. You can swap MANA from this balance to Polygon.
account_card_header.tooltip_matic: Your MANA balance on Polygon's sidechain. You can use Polygon MANA for transactions in any scene currently supporting Polygon, with no transaction fees. You can withdraw MANA from Polygon's sidechain at any time.

receive_mana_modal.title: Receive Tokens
receive_mana_modal.message: If you want to receive tokens in this wallet you can do it by sharing your address

transfer_mana_modal.title: Send Tokens
transfer_mana_modal.subtitle: Send Tokens to the desired Wallet

convert_mana_modal.subtitle_ethereum: Deposit MANA from Ethereum into Polygon
convert_mana_modal.subtitle_matic: Withdraw MANA from Polygon into Ethereum

deposit_tooltip.text: Remember, any transaction that moves assets within, to, or from the Ethereum blockchain will incur gas fees. Only transactions conducted exclusively on Polygon are gas-less. After initializing your deposit, there is a 30 minute delay before your assets will be transferred to Polygon

withdrawal_tooltip.text: After initializing your withdrawal, you must wait 30 minutes before reaching a checkpoint. After the checkpoint is reached, a transaction will be triggered in your Ethereum wallet that you must sign to complete the withdrawal
